title: Best UiPath Automation Hack
description: Build or add automation to your hack using UiPath! Each winning team member will receive a Limited Edition UiPath Branded Backpack.

title: Best Sustainability Hack
description: Develop a solution to improve sustainability within our local communities.

title: Best Environmental Action Hack
description: Damage to the Earth is near irreversible. Develop a hack that finds measurable solutions combat the global climate crisis.
